subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Another class-action lawsuit against the N.H.L. was filed Tuesday by former players saying that the league took insufficient action to reduce brain injuries caused by concussive and sub-concussive impacts.
snippet: Another class-action lawsuit against the N.H.L. was filed Tuesday by former players saying that the league took insufficient action to reduce brain injuries caused by concussive and sub-concussive impacts.
